name: Family Outing
description: Aliens are invading earth ! Ride your car across a damaged highway as you try to escape the chaos and save your life.  In this crazy action packed endless runner you have to manage the 5 free seats in your car and pick up strangers from the road. Beware as the aliens are hungry for people ! They will make requests, and you'll have to give them what they want ... or else you're going to be next ! Fetch the requested people off the road and throw them out to the aliens !
